result.markdown: --- title: "Week 8: ARIMA models" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * Stationarity and differencing * Unit root tests ## Pre-class activities Read [Sections 9.1-9.2 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/arima.html) and watch all embedded videos ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) * Complete Exercises 1-5 from [Section 9.11 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/arima-exercises.html). * [Solutions to Exercises](ex8-sol.qmd) * [Recorded tutorial code](tutorial_code.R) ## Monday lecture Download slides [Code used in lecture](seminar_code.R) ## Tuesday workshop [Activities for Tuesday workshop](activities.qmd) [Code used in workshop](workshop_code.R) ## Weekly quiz * [Week 8 quiz](https://learning.monash.edu/mod/quiz/view.php?id=3868373) is due on Sunday 04 May.
